metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26271 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was possible to execute a ReDoS-type attack inside CKEditor 4 before 4.16 by persuading a victim to paste crafted text into the Styles input of specific dialogs (in the Advanced Tab for Dialogs plugin).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-26271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ckeditor - 4.16.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: litios> No specific patch was found

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.16.0+dfsg-2').
